articles.title: McLaren forced to review Piastri, Konstas pic
articles.description: When Oscar Piastri invited a handful of Australian cricketers to tour the McLaren factory outside London last week, insiders at the leading F1 team were in a spot of bother.
articles.content:

articles.author: Brede Bleiklie Thomassen
articles.title: Viktig stevne i fare etter absurd skade: – En prestasjon i seg selv
articles.description: Et uheldig sammenstøt med en cricketspiller skaper trøbbel for Filip Ingebrigtsen. Nå kan Diamond League-stevnet i Stockholm ryke.
articles.content:
Jeg fikk en liten smell i leggen faktisk. Det var et lite uhell på den ene økta der jeg nesten kolliderte med en cricketspiller, sier Filip Ingebrigtsen til NRK. 
Ingebrigtsen skulle gjøre en av sin… [+3104 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
